channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15095] isReturnResult=false on fast path in branch-1.1 and branch-1.0 is not respected
item.description: We don't pay attention to the isReturnResult when we go the fast path increment. Fix.
item.summary: isReturnResult=false on fast path in branch-1.1 and branch-1.0 is not respected

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
make a patch on branch-1.0

As for testcase, i found restart RS not load new config, i am not sure why...

So i just start miniCluster directly for each instance.

-1 overall

+1 on the patch.

The test failure is unrelated:

TestAssignmentManager.testBalanceOnMasterFailoverScenarioWithOpenedNode:269 » TestTimedOut

Normally we'd expect clean build before commit but we are having a few little teething issues coming up on yetus so I think it fine for now to commit this on branch-1.0 and branch-1.1. Thanks Heng Chen

Only hadoop.hbase.client.replication.TestReplicationAdmin reproduced locally, it has no relates with this patch, and it will be fixed in HBASE-15108.

will commit it later
